data.message:
What have I learnt from EMINEM & his song?
1- Never be afraid to stand for what's right (Not afraid)
2- Hold your family way above others cuz without them all the fame & success won't matter (When I'm gone)
3- Never be an obsessed fan (Stan)
4- Take criticism in a positive way but don't change yourself for em (The way I am)
5- Opportunities come once in a lifetime (Lose yourself)
6- Never bully people you never know when they'll bounce back (No love)
7- Be a maniac the whole world is full of morons (The real slim shady)
8- Always be down to earth (we made you)
9- Sometimes you must go crazy and enjoy your life (Berzerk & just lose it)
10- There is a monster in all of us, we just need to fite it
(The monster)
11- Don't let bitches destroy you (Superman)
12- God does exist, He's aged 42 And Raps for his fans (Rap God)
And then people ask me why do I love EMINEM so much? :)
